messages.subject: compassionate communication
messages.msgSnippet: just wanted to let you know about a wonderful article in the current mothering.  it s called compassionate connection -- nonviolent communication with
messages.messageBody:
just wanted to let you know about a wonderful article in the current
mothering. it's called "compassionate connection -- nonviolent
communication with children," and it focuses on attachment parenting and
communication to support parent-child attachment past babyhood. for
more info, access www.cnvc.org.

--
Jessica Kelly
W o r d U p
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
"There would be no greater joy than to see a beautiful park
that our children and adults can go to and learn about the
oil and gas industry."
- Tony Sanchez, former Texas Parks & Wildlife Commissioner
[it's all about oil...]
